     & \ctrl[open]{2} & \ctrl[open]{2} & \ \ldots\ & \ctrl{2} & \qw \\
     & \ctrl[open]{1} & \ctrl{1} & \ \ldots\ & \ctrl{1} & \qw\\
    & \gate{U_0}& \gate{U_1} & \ \ldots\ & \gate{U_7} & \qw
\end{quantikz}
